trans-unit.source: The type of the result value assocatied with this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Tipo del valore del risultato associato a questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents the producer side of a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> unbound to a delegate, providing access to the consumer side through the <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il lato producer di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> non associato a un delegato, fornendo l'accesso al lato consumer tramite la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" />.

trans-unit.source: In many scenarios, it is useful to enable a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> to represent an external asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: In molti scenari, è utile abilitare un <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> per rappresentare un'operazione asincrona esterna.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601> is provided for this purpose.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601> viene fornito a questo scopo.

trans-unit.source: It enables the creation of a task that can be handed out to consumers, and those consumers can use the members of the task as they would any other.
trans-unit.target: Consente la creazione di un'attività che può essere inviata al consumer, e gli utenti possono utilizzare i membri dell'attività come se fossero tutti gli altri.

trans-unit.source: However, unlike most tasks, the state of a task created by a TaskCompletionSource is controlled explicitly by the methods on TaskCompletionSource.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, a differenza della maggior parte delle attività, lo stato di un'attività creata da un oggetto TaskCompletionSource è controllato in modo esplicito dai metodi su TaskCompletionSource.

trans-unit.source: This enables the completion of the external asynchronous operation to be propagated to the underlying Task.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo il completamento dell'operazione asincrona esterno di propagazione per l'attività sottostante.

trans-unit.source: The separation also ensures that consumers are not able to transition the state without access to the corresponding TaskCompletionSource.
trans-unit.target: La separazione assicura anche che i consumer non sono in grado di eseguire la transizione di stato senza l'accesso all'oggetto TaskCompletionSource corrispondente.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the entry [The Nature of TaskCompletionSource\<TResult>](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2009/06/02/9685804.aspx) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere la voce [la natura di TaskCompletionSource\<TResult >](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2009/06/02/9685804.aspx) in parallelo blog sulla programmazione con .NET.

trans-unit.source: The [Parallel Extensions samples](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=165717) also contain examples of how to use <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601>.
trans-unit.target: Il [esempi di estensione parallela](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=165717) anche contengono esempi di come utilizzare <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601>:
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare un <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601>:

trans-unit.source: All members of <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" /> are thread-safe and may be used from multiple threads concurrently.
trans-unit.target: Tutti i membri di <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" /> sono thread-safe e possono essere utilizzati da più thread contemporaneamente.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.

trans-unit.source: The state to use as the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />'s AsyncState.
trans-unit.target: Stato da usare come AsyncState dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" /> with the specified state.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" /> con lo stato specificato.

trans-unit.source: The options to use when creating the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Opzioni da usare quando si crea l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" /> with the specified options.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" /> con le opzioni specificate.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> created by this instance and accessible through its <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601.Task%2A> property will be instantiated using the specified `creationOptions`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> creato da questa istanza e accessibile tramite il relativo <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601.Task%2A> proprietà verrà creata utilizzando l'oggetto specificato `creationOptions`.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="creationOptions" /> represent options invalid for use with a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="creationOptions" /> rappresenta le opzioni non valide per l'utilizzo con <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.

trans-unit.source: The state to use as the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />'s AsyncState.
trans-unit.target: Stato da usare come AsyncState dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante.

trans-unit.source: The options to use when creating the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Opzioni da usare quando si crea l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" /> with the specified state and options.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" /> con lo stato e le opzioni specificate.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="creationOptions" /> represent options invalid for use with a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="creationOptions" /> rappresenta le opzioni non valide per l'utilizzo con <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Transitions the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Esegue la transizione dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante allo stato <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />.

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> is already in one of the three final states: <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" />, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />, or if the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante si trova già in uno dei tre stati finali: <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> o <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />, se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante è già stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Transitions the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> object into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Esegue la transizione dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante allo stato <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of exceptions to bind to this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di eccezioni da associare a questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Transitions the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> state and binds a collection of exception objects to it.
trans-unit.target: Esegue la transizione dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante allo stato <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> e associa all'oggetto una raccolta di eccezioni.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> was disposed.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> è stata eliminata.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="exceptions" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: L'argomento <paramref name="exceptions" /> è Null.

trans-unit.source: There are one or more null elements in <paramref name="exceptions" />.
trans-unit.target: Uno o più elementi Null sono presenti in <paramref name="exceptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> is already in one of the three final states: <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" />, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante è già in uno dei tre stati finali: <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> o <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />.

trans-unit.source: The exception to bind to this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Eccezione da associare a questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Transitions the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> state and binds it to a specified exception.
trans-unit.target: Esegue la transizione dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante allo stato <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> e associa questo oggetto a un'eccezione specificata.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> was disposed.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> è stata eliminata.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="exception" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: L'argomento <paramref name="exception" /> è Null.

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> is already in one of the three final states: <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" />, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante è già in uno dei tre stati finali: <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> o <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />.

trans-unit.source: The result value to bind to this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore del risultato da associare a questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Transitions the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Esegue la transizione dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante allo stato <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> was disposed.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> è stata eliminata.

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> is already in one of the three final states: <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" />, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante è già in uno dei tre stati finali: <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> o <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> created by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> creato da questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> created by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> creato da questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1" />.

trans-unit.source: This property enables a consumer to access the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> that is controlled by this instance.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà consente a un consumer di accedere al <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> controllato da questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601> object, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> property of this <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object returns <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.WaitingForActivation>
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601> oggetto, il <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> proprietà di questo <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> restituisce dell'oggetto <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.WaitingForActivation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601.SetResult%2A>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601.SetException%2A>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601.SetException%2A>, and <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601.SetCanceled%2A> methods (and their "Try" variants) on this instance all result in the relevant state transitions on this underlying Task.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601.SetResult%2A>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601.SetException%2A>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601.SetException%2A>, e <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource%601.SetCanceled%2A> metodi (e le relative varianti "Try") su questa istanza comporterà tutte le transizioni di stato relative all'attività sottostante.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to transition the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Tenta di eseguire la transizione dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante allo stato <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to transition the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Tenta di eseguire la transizione dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante allo stato <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />.

trans-unit.source: True if the operation was successful; false if the operation was unsuccessful or the object has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: True se l'operazione è stata completata; false se l'operazione non è stata completata o se l'oggetto è già stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: This operation will return false if the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> is already in one of the three final states: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>, or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>.
trans-unit.target: Questa operazione restituirà false se il <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> è già in uno dei tre stati finali: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>, o <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>.

trans-unit.source: This method also returns false if the underlying <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo restituisce false anche se l'oggetto sottostante <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> è già stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token.
trans-unit.target: Token di annullamento.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to transition the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" /> state and enables a cancellation token to be stored in the canceled task.
trans-unit.target: Tenta di eseguire la transizione dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante allo stato <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" /> e abilita l'archiviazione di un token di annullamento nell'attività annullata.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the operation is successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'operazione riesce; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The method returns false if the underlying <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object is already in one of the following three final states.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo restituisce false se l'oggetto sottostante <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> oggetto è già in uno dei tre stati finali.

trans-unit.source: This method also returns `false` if the underlying <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo restituisce anche `false` se sottostante <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> oggetto è già stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to transition the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> object into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Tenta di eseguire la transizione dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante allo stato <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of exceptions to bind to this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di eccezioni da associare a questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to transition the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> state and binds a collection of exception objects to it.
trans-unit.target: Tenta di eseguire la transizione dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante allo stato <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> e associa a questo oggetto una raccolta di eccezioni.

trans-unit.source: True if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: True se l'operazione è stata completata; in caso contrario, false.

trans-unit.source: This operation will return false if the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> is already in one of the three final states: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>, or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>.
trans-unit.target: Questa operazione restituirà false se il <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> è già in uno dei tre stati finali: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>, o <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> was disposed.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> è stata eliminata.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="exceptions" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: L'argomento <paramref name="exceptions" /> è Null.

trans-unit.source: There are one or more null elements in <paramref name="exceptions" />.
trans-unit.target: Uno o più elementi Null sono presenti in <paramref name="exceptions" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="exceptions" /> collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta <paramref name="exceptions" /> è vuota.

trans-unit.source: The exception to bind to this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Eccezione da associare a questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to transition the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> state and binds it to a specified exception.
trans-unit.target: Tenta di eseguire la transizione dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante allo stato <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> e associa tale oggetto a un'eccezione specificata.

trans-unit.source: True if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: True se l'operazione è stata completata; in caso contrario, false.

trans-unit.source: This operation will return false if the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> is already in one of the three final states: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>, or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>.
trans-unit.target: Questa operazione restituirà false se il <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> è già in uno dei tre stati finali: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>, o <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> was disposed.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource`1.Task" /> è stata eliminata.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="exception" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: L'argomento <paramref name="exception" /> è Null.

trans-unit.source: The result value to bind to this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore del risultato da associare a questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to transition the underlying <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> into the <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Tenta di eseguire la transizione dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> sottostante allo stato <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />.

trans-unit.source: True if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: True se l'operazione è stata completata; in caso contrario, false.

trans-unit.source: This operation will return false if the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> is already in one of the three final states: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>, or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>.
trans-unit.target: Questa operazione restituirà false se il <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> è già in uno dei tre stati finali: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>, o <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>.

trans-unit.source: This method also returns false if the underlying <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo restituisce false anche se l'oggetto sottostante <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> è già stato eliminato.
